name: Which Way Out
description: Which Way Out is a beautiful Physics Puzzle Plat-former full of illusions and deceit, what is real? and what is fake? what is there and what is not?. With a level designs that will make you think as well as test your skill at slight of hand. you will need patience and a curious mind to pass the many chambers.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: i3 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Standard HD graphics DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 300 MB available space Sound Card: standard sound card or motherboard sound port Additional Notes: Game runs in locked 60fps
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: i5 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 560 or radeon equivalent DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 300 MB available space Sound Card: standard sound card or motherboard sound port Additional Notes: Game runs in locked 60fps
